Seriously ... every week I mistype this!

dplyr is absolutely, 💯 my favorite #rstats package, so I made a tutorial for anyone looking to get started with exploring what dplyr can do 🐧 || https://t.co/XRWdNdXKrg

R is free.
R can be used by anyone with access to a computer.
With its welcoming and inclusive community, R users make packages focused on equity.
If you care about social justice, there’s no better tool to use than R. #rstats

Ok I'm sure these are pretty well-known tips among #ggplot2  aficionados, but as a still somewhat beginner, I'm gonna tweet out some of my favorite tips and tricks for beautiful plots for other beginners. I'm working on figures for a poster now so I'll do them as I go. #rstats 1/

New blogpost going through a few cases of nicely plotting points as images in #ggplot2 !

Main goal: Avoid "warping" of images and general strategies.

Full code to reproduce, some "good" and "bad" examples all w/ NFL data.

Post: https://t.co/KlzLEf6A3m

#rstats #tidyverse

I built my first R package today. It was a bit nerve wracking right before ctrl + shift + b, but 🪅🎖️🙌🎊! #Rstats #Rladies This was a package to learn how to make a package. Thrilled to start work on the package I have wanted to make for a year!
